title.narrative: Strengthening Capacity for an Integrated Approach to Trade and Aid for Trade Enhancement, Job Creation, Poverty Reduction and Wealth Creation in Lesotho under Enhanced Integrated Framework for Trade Related Technical Assistance (EIF)

description.narrative: The project aims at strengthening the institutional arrangements for implementation and ownership of both the EIF and the Aid for Trade (AfT) programmes in Lesotho; and to maximise the benefits that the country, can derive from the EIF. The project will enable the NIU and the National Steering Committee (NSC) to effectively engage in the implementation of the EIF process and Aid for Trade at large. It will also provide long term support and capacity building to the NIU and the EIF Focal Point (FP). It will facilitate updating of the Diagnostic Trade Integrated Study (DTIS) from which a new action matrix will be developed; as well as the preparation and implementation of a Trade and Export Development Strategy to advance trade mainstreaming. Coordination of the existing trade related initiatives, through inter-ministerial consultation mechanisms will also be further strengthened. Further activities aim at a better coordinated delivery of Aid for Trade, and the implementation of trade and export productive capacity building priorities.
